p:
The genus Flavivirus , of the Flaviviridade family, is composed of some of the most pathogenic human viruses (Arboviruses), including Dengue virus (DENV), Yellow fever virus (YFV), Zika virus (ZIKV) and West Nile virus (WNV), among others
1 - 4 . These are mosquito-borne diseases transmitted by the same hematophagous arthropod vectors, and their main hosts are vertebrate animals, with primates, humans and non-humans, as hosts
1 , 3 , 5 .
